tool_description: Creates bootable installation media for operating system installation or recovery, supporting USB drives and optical media with proper formatting and file copying.

os_iso_path.description: Path to the operating system ISO file

target_device.description: Target device path for bootable media creation

boot_mode.description: Boot mode: UEFI, Legacy, or Hybrid

file_system.description: File system format: FAT32, NTFS, or exFAT

verify_media.description: Whether to verify bootable media after creation

error_messages: ISO file not found: Ensure the specified ISO file path exists and is accessible.
Invalid target device: Verify the target device is connected and accessible.
Insufficient device capacity: Target device does not have enough space for the ISO file.
Unsupported boot mode: Use one of [UEFI, Legacy, Hybrid].
Invalid file system: Use one of [FAT32, NTFS, exFAT].
Media creation failed: Unable to write bootable files to target device.
Media verification failed: Created media failed bootability test.
usage: Provide path to OS ISO file and target USB device. Choose boot_mode based on system requirements (UEFI for modern systems, Legacy for older systems, Hybrid for compatibility). FAT32 recommended for UEFI compatibility.

media_size_gb.description: Size of created bootable media in gigabytes

creation_time_minutes.description: Time taken to create bootable media in minutes

boot_files_count.description: Number of boot files copied to media

verification_result.description: Media verification and bootability test result
